  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and Exhibits  
                                                 
Exhibits are filed herewith in connection with the 
Registration Statement on Form S-3(File No.        
333-269514)filed by Wells Fargo & Company (the     
“Company”) with the Securities and Exchange        
Commission (the “SEC”). On July 25, 2023, the      
Company issued the following Medium-Term Notes,    
Series W: (i) $4,250,000,000 Senior Redeemable     
Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due July 25, 2029; and 
(ii) $4,250,000,000 Senior Redeemable Fixed-to-    
FloatingRate Notes due July 25, 2034 (collectively,
the “Notes”). The purpose of this Current Report is
to file with the SEC the following documents: (i)  
the form of Note related to each issuance; and (ii)
the opinion of Faegre Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP   
regarding the Notes.
